title: Video: Tree – Universal
content: Released earlier this year, Universal from SF psychedelic musician Tree now has an official music video to accompany it. One of the finest/weirdest tracks of 2012 so far, Tree has also announced his signing to R&S offshoot Apollo, with a collaboration with Beat Culture expected later this year. In true Tree style, the video is wonderfully trippy, taking the viewer on an acid driven experience; gloriously bizarre I’m sure you’ll agree. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
